Module pcouture.software
Package controller

Class UpdateCustomerFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomerFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerFormController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
UpdateCustomerFormController controls the updating customer form page which allows the user to update a customer's information.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This function is run when the controller is initialized. It gets the database connection.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The url of the page
      resourceBundle - The bundles with resources

    • onActionUpdateCustCountryComBx

      public void onActionUpdateCustCountryComBx(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      This function is activated when the customer's country is selected in the combobox. It will give the user different first level divisions depending on the country selected.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action of the combobox being selected
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL error occurs

    • onActionUpdateCustStateComBx

      public void onActionUpdateCustStateComBx(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)

    • onActionUpdateCustSaveBtn

      public void onActionUpdateCustSaveBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This method saves the customer's information (name, address, phone number and postal code) on the database, and verifies that the data has been inserted correctly.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - An event to indicate that the "Save" button has been pressed
      Throws:
      IOException - When there is an input/output error in reading/writing from/to a database
      SQLException - When there is an error in executing an SQL database query

    • onActionUpdateCustCancelBtn

      public void onActionUpdateCustCancelBtn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method closes the current window and loads the ApptCustOverView fxml.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The action event of the cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to locate or open the ApptCustOverView fxml.

    • receiveCustomerData

      public void receiveCustomerData(Customers updateCustomer) throws SQLException
      This method gets customer data from a Customer object and populates text fields and combobox selections.
      Parameters:
      updateCustomer - A Customer object with the customer's data.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error accesssing the database occurs.
